weka.core.stemmers

Class SCStemmer

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.stemmers.SCStemmer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.core.stemmers.Stemmer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LjubesicPandzicStemmer, SerbianStemmer

    public abstract class SCStemmer
extends java.lang.Object
implements weka.core.stemmers.Stemmer
    Osnovna apstraktna klasa za funkcije zajedničke za sve stemere za srpski i hrvatski

    The basic abstract class for the functions common to all stemmers for Serbian and Croatian

    Author:
    Vuk Batanović
    See Also:
    Reliable Baselines for Sentiment Analysis in Resource-Limited Languages: The Serbian Movie Review Dataset, Vuk Batanović, Boško Nikolić, Milan Milosavljević, in Proceedings of the 10th International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC 2016), pp. 2688-2696, Portorož, Slovenia (2016).
    https://github.com/vukbatanovic/SCStemmers
    , Serialized Form

      • replaceSpaceWithNewLine

        public void replaceSpaceWithNewLine(java.lang.String fileInput,
                                    java.lang.String fileOutput)
        Olakšava poređenje stemovanih fajlova sa izlazom nekih izvornih implementacija tako što upisuje svaki token u poseban red izlaznog fajla

        Makes it easier to compare stemmed files with the output of some of the original implementations by writing every token in a separate line of the output file

        Parameters:
        fileInput - Ime ulaznog fajla u kome je tekst normalno napisan.
        The name of the input file in which the text is normally written.
        fileOutput - Ime izlaznog fajla u kome tekst treba da bude napisan tako da svaka reč bude u posebnom redu.
        The name of the output file in which text should be written one word per line.

      • stemWord

        public abstract java.lang.String stemWord(java.lang.String word)

      • stemLine

        public abstract java.lang.String stemLine(java.lang.String line)

      • stemText

        public java.lang.String stemText(java.lang.String text)
        Stemuje string koji sadrži više linija teksta

        Stems a string which contains multiple lines of text

        Parameters:
        text - String koji sadrži više linija teksta
        The string which contains multiple lines of text
        Returns:
        String koji sadrži više linija teksta sa stemovanim rečima
        The string which contains multiple lines of text with stemmed words

      • stemFile

        public void stemFile(java.lang.String fileInput,
                     java.lang.String fileOutput)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Stemuje sadržaj ulaznog fajla i upisuje stemovani sadržaj u izlazni fajl

        Stems the contents of the input file and writes them into the output file

        Parameters:
        fileInput - Ime ulaznog fajla
        The name of the input file
        fileOutput - Ime izlaznog fajla
        The name of the output file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Označava grešku pri radu sa fajlom
        Signals an error during file operation
